Parma.Bomante House:
The Bomante House, also known as the Bomonti House, is a historic home located at 3000 Mapledale Avenue in Cleveland, Ohio, in the United States. Built in 1905 in the Swiss Chalet Revival, it exemplifies the architectural impact of one of Cleveland's largest immigrant communities.


== About the structure ==
Frederick W. Bomonti was born in Switzerland about 1864.
